title: New global perspectives will hit your inbox
description: For years, we’ve talked about the death of parachute journalism. In 2026, the story won’t just be its demise, but the rise of local journalism, reimagined for a global stage. I’m not talking about small-town reports in community newsletters. I mean ambitious, nuanced reporting from suppressed or overlooked perspectives across the world. We will see...
